{{cpp/chrono/title|1=operator=={{small|(std::chrono::year_month_weekday)}}}}
{{cpp/chrono/year_month_weekday/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|chrono}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|1=
constexpr bool operator==( const std::chrono::year_month_weekday&amp; x,
                           const std::chrono::year_month_weekday&amp; y ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

比较两个 {{tt|year_month_weekday}} 值 {{c|x}} 与 {{c|y}}。

{{cpp/note synthesized eq}}

=== 返回值 ===
{{c|1=x.year() == y.year() &amp;&amp; x.month() == y.month() &amp;&amp; x.weekday_indexed() == y.weekday_indexed()}}

=== 示例 ===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;chrono&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
using namespace std::chrono;
 
int main()
{
    constexpr auto ymwdi1{Wednesday[1]/January/2021};
    constexpr year_month_weekday ymwdi2{year(2021), month(1), weekday(3)[1]};
    std::cout &lt;&lt; std::boolalpha &lt;&lt; (ymwdi1 == ymwdi2) &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
true
}}
